description: Managing information technology related projects that require expertise in software development and implementation
full_summary:
# TBIPS under Streams 1, 4 and 5 Tender Notice

## TTBender Accounting Information

- **Contract Title**: TBIPS under Streams 1, 4, and 5
- **Reference Number**: CB-8436-4556631
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: 230034-TBIPS-RFP-CIHR
- **Publication Date**: August 25, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 11, 2023, 2:00 PM
- **Amendment Date**: September 11, 2023

## Contract Details

- **Contracting Authority**: Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR)
- **Contracting Address**: 160 Elgin St, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0W9, Canada
- **End User**: CIHR

## Tender Description

The Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) invites all holders of a TBIPS Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) in Tier 1 within the National Capital Region under the contract Solicitation Number EN578-170432 to submit a bid for the provision of Business System Analysts, Project Managers, Testers, Programmers/Analysts, and Web Designers under the TBIPS under Streams 1, 4, and 5.

CIHR plans to award up to seven (7) contracts, each for a one-year period, with four (4) one-year optional period extensions. The contracts will be awarded based on a combined score of technical merit and price. Bidders may submit a bid for one or all resource categories.

The resources will be selected based on the following criteria:

- Analysts (level 2)
- Project Managers (level 2)
- Testers (level 2)
- Programmers/Analysts (level 2 and 3)
- Web Designers (level 3)

## Imposed Security Requirements

- Common PS SRCL #01 applies.
- Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Reliability are the minimum required security clearances.

## Instructions for Bidders

- Interested contractors can access the tender package on the Government of Canada's Tendering System.
- Questions regarding the tender should be directed to CIHR's procurement contact, Gerode Tchibozo.

## Inquiry Period

- End of inquiry period: September 7, 2023
